channel.title: Adding customs
channel.description: im trying to add the staff capes to my server, i sorted all the compiler problems and there are 0 errors. when i have one in my inventory it freezes the client, if i force equipt it then i turn invisible and as soon as i view the equipment tab the client freezes. as far as i am aware its a PI client

item.title: Adding customs
item.dc:creator: @josh225 josh225
item.description:
@josh225 wrote:

i downloaded them. my laptop is way too slow to make them. would the fact that they where converted from class8 into itemdef have anything to affect it?

Read full topic
